title: Last Christmas

des: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

des: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

des: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

des: Multiple coincidences and a chance meeting bring Alice and Jack, two strangers from very different family backgrounds, together for a weekend wedding celebration. Encouraged by her family, ...                See full summary »

title: Footloose

title: Christmas at Holly Lodge
des: Sophie Bennett, the owner, tries to convince a developer that the lodge would be a bad investment.

title: Love the Coopers

title: I Origins

title: The Two Jakes
des: The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.

title: Adventures in Babysitting

title: Tootsie

des: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

des: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: Christmas at the Palace
des: Katie, a former professional ice skater (Patterson), is hired by the king of San Senova, Alexander, to help his daughter in a Christmas ice skating performance. As Katie spends time in the ...                See full summary »

des: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

des: After being killed on his first date, idiotic and perverted Issei Hyodo is resurrected as a demon by Rias Gremory only to be recruited into her club of high-class devils.

des: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

des: Flight attendant Sydney (Brooke Burns) is tasked with looking after Leah, an eight-year-old unaccompanied minor flying back to Chicago after visiting family. Sydney is charmed by the little...                See full summary »

Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

des: Chloe plans the 1st Christmas fair in town where she meets Evan and falls in love but he has to go to Norway for his dream job. 2nd Xmas fair a year later he brings a cute Swede. 3rd Xmas fair Chloe is dating Ted. How about 4th Xmas fair?

des: Two sisters contend for the affection of King Henry VIII.

des: Jenna Hudson (Bethany Joy Lenz) and Kevin Jenner (Andrew Walker) are polar opposites working for the same online publication in New York City. With both having nowhere they want to be for ...                See full summary »

des: A military family takes part in a ground-breaking experiment of genetic evolution and space exploration.

des: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

des: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

des: Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.

title: Hope at Christmas
des: Sydney Ragsdale (Thompson), recently divorced, decides to spend Christmas in a house she inherited with her young daughter. As Sydney begins to spend more time at the local bookstore, she ...                See full summary »
